roleset.name: to make an attack, criticize strongly

example.name: intransitive
example.text: `` Now , '' says Joseph Napolitan , a pioneer in political television , `` the idea is to attack first , last and always . ''

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Baldwin is also attacking the greater problem : lack of ringers .

propbank.arg: the greater problem : lack of ringers

example.name: with cause
example.text: And they continue anonymously attacking CIA Director William Webster for being too accommodating to the committee .

propbank.arg: for being too accommodating to the committee

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Over the past nine months , several firms , including discount broker Charles Schwab & Co. and Sears , Roebuck & Co. 's Dean Witter Reynolds Inc. unit , have attacked program trading as a major market evil .

propbank.arg: several firms , including discount broker Charles Schwab & Co. and Sears , Roebuck & Co. 's Dean Witter Reynolds Inc. unit

example.name: Args 1 and MNR
example.text: As early as move six , Mr. Kasparov deviated from a well - known sequence of moves , developing a knight instead of making a standard bishop attack against the computer 's advanced knight .

example.name: NP only, Args 0 & 1
example.text: their attacks on program trading and its contributions to thestock market 's wild price swings

propbank.arg: on program trading and its contributions to thestock market 's wild price swings

example.name: MNR and Arg0
example.text: The president came under sharp attack from members of Congress for his foreign policy .

example.name: Arg 0 only in "by" PP
example.text: Small pets are subject to attack by these roaming nocturnal predators .

example.name: Metaphorical attack, illness
example.text: The new medication has reduced Sally 's asthma attacks .

example.name: Metaphorical attack, Arg0 only
example.text: The student froze during the beginning of her piano recital from an attack of nerves .

example.name: Arg 0 as "of" PP
example.text: The hinge was weakened by an attack of rust .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Tom , making it abundantly clear that the Clinton / Gore scandals of the past eight years will be a major theme in the closing days of this campaign , Bush attacks the Vice President for being a failed leader and promises if he 's elected Americans will once again be able to respect their government .

propbank.arg: making it abundantly clear that the Clinton / Gore scandals of the past eight years will be a major theme in the closing days of this campaign

roleset.note: ATTACK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls judgement-33. (from attack.01-v)
ATTACK-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry attack.01, OntoNotes grouping attack-n senses 1-9; maps to VN class judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from attack.01-n)
ATTACKING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from attacking.01-n)
Noun roleset has both "instrument" and "attribute," where verb frame has only attribute because of gaming usages where game piece is "attacker." (from attack.01-n)
